item.description:
Come out and meet other people who are planning on going to Montreal! Have a beer and a bite to eat, maybe play a game of pool, and discuss what you are looking forward to seeing and doing on the Memorial Day long weekend. This will also be a chance for folks to find someone to carpool or share a room with.

If you need a ride to this event, please ask for one in your rsvp saying what area you are in.

The Wave Sports Pub
411 Waverley Oaks Road, Suite 204 (drive around to the rear)
Waltham, MA 02452
781-894-7011

http://www.wavesports...
item.name: Montreal trip meet & mingle
